scripts.build: npm run d && npm run mk-secure && npm run rollup
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf dist-secure && (rm -rf lib/**/*.d.ts || :) && (rm -rf lib-secure/**/*.d.ts || :)
scripts.mk-secure: npm run jay && mv ./lib/*.jay.html.ts ./lib-secure/main && cp ./lib/*-refs.d.ts ./lib-secure/main && find lib -name '*.ts' '!' -name '*.jay.html.d.ts' '!' -name 'index.ts' | xargs -I{} cp {} ./lib-secure/sandbox
